main.name: Purity Ruth
main.description: I am a full stack developer engineer well versed in numerous programming languages which include React, Python, Django, Laravel, Angular and vue.js.  I have a good experience with all stages of the development cycle for dynamic web projects. I have excellent design skills, development and deployment management abilities to produce flawless applications.
main.bio: I would describe myself as someone who is creative, objective oriented, innovative, hardworking and timeline oriented. I am also an individual known to make sure things work perfectly and as intended, in order to provide high level efficiency. I am able to recognize my capabilities and work well in accordance to desired expectations, to enhance client satisfaction with my work. I am able to work with my skills proficiently to provide the best services and I always look forward to get solutions as much as possible using technology.
main.contactmessage: Please write your message here to get in touch with me.

resume.skillmessage: A short write-up of my skills is as described below

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: I have a bachelor's degree in Computer science, I acquired knowledge in most used programming languages such as C, C++, Java, Python, PHP, HTML, CSS and JavaScript, as well as database management using MySql, MongoDB and Postgress. I am also familiar with discrete structures, Operating systems, Networking, Data structures and algorithms, blockchain technology, data science and cyber security. I have good skills in Web development, using most of well known javascript frameworks such as React js and Agular for client side applications, Django and Laravel frameworks for server side applications.
This is where I got a good interaction with what computers and technology can do, therefore developed my interest in pursuing a degree in an Information Technology related field.

work.title: Lead Software Developer
work.description: Leading software development initiatives, ensuring project alignment with goals and timelines. Overseeing CI/CD pipeline implementation, DevOps practices, and cloud deployments. Managing cross-functional collaboration with stakeholders to deliver high-quality software solutions. Conducting code reviews and integrating innovative technologies to enhance efficiency and scalability.

work.title: Team Lead/Project Manager
work.description: Led the development team to ensure core system functionality and performance. Optimized development workflows, conducted code reviews, and enforced best practices. Managed QA efforts, ensuring reliable system performance and timely delivery of updates.

work.title: Lead Senior Developer
work.description: Supervised a team of developers, offering guidance and mentorship. Designed and implemented scalable software solutions. Collaborated with project managers, designers, and QA engineers to enhance communication and project execution. Conducted code reviews, shared best practices, and drove process improvements.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Developed and maintained web applications using JavaScript and Python. Led cloud migration initiatives using AWS and Docker, reducing infrastructure costs by 40%. Built and maintained RESTful APIs for high-performance applications. Provided system support, troubleshooting, training, and documentation. Ensured software quality through continuous integration and QA processes.

work.title: Software Engineer/ Hardware Engineer
work.description: Implemented secure authentication systems using OAuth 2.0. Developed biometric registration and verification services. Designed and tested software applications. Configured and managed network equipment, including routers and security appliances. Provided system maintenance, troubleshooting, and client support.

work.title: Assistant Network Administrator/Assistant Hardware Engineer
work.description: Collected and stored system data, including CCTV footage. Performed system maintenance, troubleshooting, and data verification. Assembled and repaired computer hardware components.
